Flow.description: Move create case to the end Remove Submit for approval

formulas.name: APP_CustomApp_RecordData_To_CaseDescriptionSummary
formulas.expression: "Project Name: " +{!Project_Name} &BR() &"Project Request Type: " +{!Project_Request_Type} &BR() &"Goal of Project Request: " +{!Goal_of_Project_Request} &BR() &"Target Audience: " +{!Target_Audience} &BR() &"Have all stakeholders reviewed?: " +{!Have_all_stakeholders_reviewed} &BR() &"Are the drafts ready?: " +{!Are_the_drafts_ready} &BR() &"Deadline: " +TEXT({!Deadline}) &BR() &"Is the deadline flexible?: " +{!Is_the_deadline_flexible} &BR()

fields.name: msg
fields.fieldText: Before submitting a request, please refer to the Communications Guidelines for information about standard practices and timelines for each of the sections below. New projects include requests to review, design, translate or print a new publication. Note: CPRs for projects due by 6/30 must be submitted no later than 1/15. Please also review the Race to Justice Action Kit for resources on how to incorporate racial equity and social justice principles while planning communications materials.

fields.name: Is_this_related_to_any_existing_materials_or_past_projects
fields.fieldText: Is this related to any existing materials or past projects? If so, please specify

fields.name: FW_Case_Confirmation_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Your case # {!FW_Create_Case.Case.Reference_Number__c} has been created successfully.

fields.name: FW_Rollback_Confirmation_Message
fields.fieldText: An error has occurred. The system admins have been notified of the error.
